section.title: PID Class Reference

para.para: A class to implement a PID controller.

section.section:
Detailed Description
A class to implement a PID controller.
The PID class provides methods to set PID coefficients, compute the output value, and set limits for the output value. It also provides getter and setter methods for the PID coefficients.
Note
The compute method should be called periodically to update the output value.
The documentation for this class was generated from the following file: lib/PID/pid.hpp
